Download DATRAS tables

dr_download_data.Rd

Each DATRAS table (HH, HL, CA and FL) is downloaded and saved.

Usage

dr_download_data(
  surveys = NULL,
  years = NULL,
  quarters = NULL,
  outpath = "data",
  filetype = "parquet"
)

Arguments

surveys

Survey to get, if none specified get all

years

Years to download, if none specified get all from 1990 onwards. Not yet active.

quarters

Quarters to download, if none specified get all from 1990 onwards. Not yet active.

outpath

The path (default 'data') where saved DATRAS exchange files are stored

filetype

File type (default 'parquet'). Currently inactive. '

Value

Files on disk
